Up.name: Up
Up.desc: Selects the above entry in the explorer

Down.name: Down
Down.desc: Selects the below entry in the explorer

Left.name: Left
Left.desc: Selects the left entry in the explorer

Right.name: Right
Right.desc: Selects the right entry in the explorer

ToggleMark.name: Toogle mark
ToggleMark.desc: Mark or unmark the current entry as selected

OpenFileWith.name: Open file with
OpenFileWith.desc: Opens the selected files with the given application

Start.name: Start
Start.desc: Goes to start of the explorer

End.name: End
End.desc: Goes to end of the explorer

PageForward.name: Page forward
PageForward.desc: Goes one page forward in the explorer

PageBackward.name: Page backward
PageBackward.desc: Goes one page backward in the explorer

HalfPageForward.name: Half page forward
HalfPageForward.desc: Goes half page forward in the explorer

HalfPageBackward.name: Half page backward
HalfPageBackward.desc: Goes half page backward in the explorer

PalleteNext.name: Pallete next
PalleteNext.desc: Selects the next command on the pallete

PalletePrevious.name: Pallete previous
PalletePrevious.desc: Selects the previous command on the pallete

PalleteExecute.name: Pallete execute
PalleteExecute.desc: Executes the selected command on the pallete

PalleteComplete.name: Pallete complete
PalleteComplete.desc: Completes the pallete query with the selected item

SaveSettings.name: Save settings
SaveSettings.desc: Writes the settings to the configuration file

MoveToTrash.name: Move to trash bin
MoveToTrash.desc: Moves a file system entry to the trash bin

Create.name: Create
Create.desc: Creates a new file system entry
